thread.title: Kuwait issues Lebanon travel warning
thread.title_full: Kuwait issues Lebanon travel warning | Travelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Kuwait issues Lebanon travel warning
text:
Kuwait issues Lebanon travel warning
The Kuwaiti embassy in Beirut three days back (on July 30) advised nationals to delay plans to travel to Lebanon and called on those in the country to take precautionary measures.
In a press statement, the embassy also urged Kuwaitis visiting the country to be on high alert when move from a place to another and avoid unsafe places there.
Kuwaitis were also advised to contact the embassy if they need any assistance for their safety.
Lebanon has witnessed a series of bombings and armed clashes over the past four years mainly as a result of Syriaâ€™s civil war.
